column4: I want to expand my ubuntu partition (ext4) to take up some space from my windows partition, I don't care if i lose data on the windows partition but i want to NOT lose anything on my linux partition. Can i do this with gparted?
Yes.  But you have to boot with a live CD.  You can't edit partitions that you have mounted.
In order to unmount root you need to boot a live CD
can i do this with a ubuntu live cd?
